tasks.title: Ownership of token Bonk BONK
tasks.label: ownership
tasks.description: Prove that you have token ownership of Bonk in your Doerz wallet. This task involves buying BONK, such as through Jupiter or Raydium.
userInstructions: Go to a Solana DEX like Jupiter or Raydium
Confirm correct token, program ID is DezXAZ8z7PnrnRJjz3wXBoRgixCa6xjnB7YaB1pPB263
Buy BONK tokens
Transfer the tokens to your Doerz wallet
Go to the Doerz validate page
Click the validate button

tasks.title: Post a Tweet about the new messaging features
tasks.label: social
tasks.description: Post a Tweet about the new messaging features on Dialect to spread the word about the latest updates. This task helps in promoting the messaging capabilities of the app and reaching a broader audience on social media.
userInstructions: Log in to your Twitter account
Compose a new Tweet about the messaging features of Dialect
Include relevant hashtags and mention Dialect
Attach any images or links that highlight the new features
Post the Tweet and take a screenshot

tasks.title: Complete 10 tasks to earn a special Solana badge
tasks.label: achievements
tasks.description: Complete 10 tasks on Doerz.fun to earn a special Solana badge. This achievement encourages users to engage with the platform and complete various tasks to unlock exclusive rewards and recognition within the Solana community.
userInstructions: Log in to your Doerz.fun account
Navigate to the tasks section
Select tasks that interest you
Complete the selected tasks
Check your profile for the special Solana badge

tasks.title: Complete your profile setup to start earning rewards
tasks.label: onboarding
tasks.description: Complete your profile setup on Realms to start earning rewards. This task involves filling out necessary profile information, which enables you to access various reward opportunities and engage fully with the platform.
userInstructions: Log in to your Realms account
Go to your profile settings
Fill out all required profile information
Upload a profile picture
Save your changes to complete the setup

tasks.title: Build a new feature for the Solana API
tasks.label: developer
tasks.description: Build a new feature for the Solana API as part of this developer task. This involves creating and implementing a new feature that enhances the functionality of the Solana blockchain API, contributing to the developer community.
userInstructions: Familiarize yourself with the Solana API documentation
Identify a feature to implement
Write the code for the new feature
Test the feature thoroughly
Submit your code for review

tasks.title: Finish your first 5 tasks for extra rewards
tasks.label: achievements
tasks.description: Finish your first 5 tasks on Doerz.fun to earn extra rewards. This task is designed to incentivize new users to engage with the platform by offering additional rewards for completing initial tasks.
userInstructions: Log in to your Doerz.fun account
Navigate to the tasks section
Select your first five tasks
Complete the tasks as instructed
Check your rewards section for extra rewards

tasks.title: Debug Solana's UTF8 parsing issue and submit a fix
tasks.label: developer
tasks.description: Debug Solana's UTF8 parsing issue and submit a fix. This task involves identifying and resolving bugs related to UTF8 parsing in the Solana codebase, contributing to the stability and reliability of the platform.
userInstructions: Review the Solana codebase
Locate the UTF8 parsing issue
Debug and fix the issue
Test the fix to ensure it works correctly
Submit the fix for review

tasks.title: Upload your profile picture on Realms
tasks.label: onboarding
tasks.description: Upload your profile picture on Realms as part of the onboarding process. Completing this task helps personalize your profile and allows you to fully participate in the platform's activities and reward system.
userInstructions: Log in to your Realms account
Go to your profile settings
Click on 'Upload Profile Picture'
Select a picture from your device
Save your changes

tasks.title: Register a new wallet and verify it
tasks.label: ownership
tasks.description: Register a new wallet and verify it on Phantom. This task is essential for setting up your digital wallet, ensuring its security, and enabling you to manage your assets on the Solana blockchain.
userInstructions: Download and install the Phantom wallet
Create a new wallet account
Follow the verification steps provided
Secure your wallet with a strong password
Complete the verification process

validate.name: ownership
validate.displayDescription: The task requires the user to verify ownership of a specific item or account.
